amendment.description: An amendment numbered 177 printed in Part A of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funds appropriated by this Act to be used to implement the administration's executive orders related to climate change.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A033) Agreed to by voice vote.
